grim/

grim_menus_include.pro


Routines

Routines from grim_menus_include.pro

grim_menu_file_load_help_event, event

Allows user to load images into new image planes.

grim_menu_file_browse_help_event, event

Allows user to load images into new image planes using the BRIM browser.

grim_menu_file_save_help_event, event

Allows user to save the current image plane and geometry.

grim_menu_file_save_as_help_event, event

Same as 'Save' above, except always prompts for a filename.

grim_menu_open_as_rgb_help_event, event

Opens a new GRIM window with the current channal configuration reduced to a 3-channel RGB cube.

grim_menu_file_save_user_ptd_help_event, event

Writes user points for the current plane to a file called [image name].user_ptd

grim_menu_file_save_all_user_ptd_help_event, event

Writes user points for all planes to files called [image name].user_ptd

grim_menu_file_save_detached_header_help_event, event

Saves a detached header for the current plane.

grim_menu_file_save_all_detached_headers_help_event, event

Writes detached headers for all planes to files called [image name].dh User is prompted for the directory name.

grim_menu_file_load_user_ptd_help_event, event

loads user points for the current plane from a file called [image name].user_ptd

grim_menu_file_load_all_user_ptd_help_event, event

Loads user points for all planes from files called [image name].user_ptd

grim_menu_file_save_tie_ptd_help_event, event

Writes tie points for the current plane to a file called [image name].tie_ptd

grim_menu_file_save_all_tie_ptd_help_event, event

Writes tie points for all planes to files called [image name].tie_ptd

grim_menu_file_load_tie_ptd_help_event, event

loads tie points for the current plane from a file called [image name].tie_ptd

grim_menu_file_load_all_tie_ptd_help_event, event

Loads tie points for all planes from files called [image name].tie_ptd

grim_menu_file_save_curves_help_event, event

Writes curves for the current plane to a file called [image name].curve_ptd

grim_menu_file_save_all_curves_help_event, event

Writes curves for all planes to files called [image name].curve_ptd

grim_menu_file_load_curves_help_event, event

loads curves for the current plane from a file called [image name].curve_ptd

grim_menu_file_load_all_curves_help_event, event

Loads curves for all planes from files called [image name].curve_ptd

grim_menu_file_save_mask_help_event, event

Writes mask points for the current plane to a file called [image name].mask

grim_menu_file_save_all_masks_help_event, event

Writes mask points for all planes to files called [image name].mask

grim_menu_file_load_mask_help_event, event

loads mask points for the current plane from a file called [image name].mask

grim_menu_file_load_all_masks_help_event, event

Loads mask points for all planes from files called [image name].mask

grim_menu_file_save_ps_help_event, event

Saves the current view as a postscript file.

grim_menu_repeat_help_event, event

Repeats the last menu option.

grim_menu_undo_help_event, event

Undoes the last data modification.

grim_menu_redo_help_event, event

Redoes the last data modification.

grim_select_help_event, event

Selects or unselects a grim window.

grim_identify_help_event, event

Causes grim to identify itself on the IDL command line.

grim_menu_file_close_help_event, event

Closes the current image plane.

grim_menu_plane_next_help_event, event

Changes to the next-numbered image plane.

grim_menu_plane_previous_help_event, event

Changes to the previous-numbered image plane.

grim_menu_plane_jump_help_event, event

Prompts the user and jumps to a new plane.

grim_menu_plane_browse_help_event, event

Opens a brim browser showing all planes.

grim_menu_plane_open_help_event, event

Opens the image of the current plane in a new grim window.

grim_menu_plane_evolve_help_event, event

Evolves the selected objects onto all other planes.

grim_menu_plane_crop_help_event, event

Crops the data to the current viewing parameters.

grim_menu_plane_reorder_time_help_event, event

Rearranges all planes in time order.

grim_menu_plane_sequence_help_event, event

Displays all planes in sequence using xinteranimate.

grim_menu_plane_dump_help_event, event

Dumps all planes to png files entitled [filename].png.

grim_menu_plane_coregister_help_event, event

Shifts the images on each plane so as to center the active object at the same pixel on each plane.

grim_menu_plane_coadd_help_event, event

Averages all planes.

grim_menu_plane_toggle_plane_syncing_help_event, event

Toggles plane syncing on/off.

grim_menu_plane_highlight_help_event, event

Toggles highlighting of the current plane image.

grim_menu_plane_copy_tiepoints_help_event, event

Copies tie points from the current plane to all other planes.

grim_menu_plane_propagate_tiepoints_help_event, event

Copies all tieppoints from the current plane to all other planes.

grim_menu_plane_toggle_tiepoint_syncing_help_event, event

Toggles tiepoint syncing on/off.

grim_menu_plane_clear_tiepoints_help_event, event

Clears all tiepoints from the current plane.

grim_menu_plane_copy_curves_help_event, event

Copies all curves from the current plane to all other planes.

grim_menu_plane_toggle_curve_syncing_help_event, event

Toggles curve syncing on/off.

grim_menu_plane_clear_curves_help_event, event

Clears all curves from the current plane.

grim_menu_plane_copy_mask_help_event, event

Copies mask from the current plane to all other planes.

grim_menu_plane_clear_mask_help_event, event

Clears the mask from the current plane.

grim_menu_plane_settings_help_event, event

Allows the user modify settings for the loaded image planes. Each plane may displayed in any combination of the three color channels.

grim_menu_data_adjust_help_event, event

This option allows the user to adjust data values.

grim_menu_view_refresh_help_event, event

Redraws the overlays on the graphics display.

grim_menu_view_zoom_help_event, event

Prompts the user for a new zoom factor.

grim_menu_view_zoom_double_help_event, event

Doubles the current zoom, centered at the mouse cursor.

grim_menu_view_zoom_half_help_event, event

Halves the current zoom, centered at the mouse cursor.

grim_menu_view_zoom_1_help_event, event

Sets the current zoom to 1, centered at the mouse cursor.

grim_menu_view_zoom_2_help_event, event

Sets the current zoom to 2, centered at the mouse cursor.

grim_menu_view_zoom_3_help_event, event

Sets the current zoom to 3, centered at the mouse cursor.

grim_menu_view_zoom_4_help_event, event

Sets the current zoom to 4, centered at the mouse cursor.

Sets the current zoom to 5, centered at the mouse cursor.

Sets the current zoom to 6, centered at the mouse cursor.

grim_menu_view_zoom_7_help_event, event

Sets the current zoom to 7, centered at the mouse cursor.

Sets the current zoom to 10, centered at the mouse cursor.

Sets the current rotate to 0, centered at the mouse cursor.

grim_menu_view_recenter_help_event, event

Recenters the view at the cursor position.

grim_menu_view_apply_help_event, event

Applys the current view to all planes.

grim_menu_view_home_help_event, event

Sets the tvim home view settings.

grim_menu_view_save_help_event, event

Saves the current view settings.

grim_menu_view_restore_help_event, event

Restores the last-saved view settings.

grim_menu_view_previous_help_event, event

Restores the previous view settings.

grim_menu_view_entire_help_event, event

Applies the 'entire' display parameters, as given in tvim.

grim_menu_view_initial_help_event, event

Reverts to the initial view parameters for this grim widget.

grim_menu_view_flip_help_event, event

Reverses the curent display order.

grim_menu_view_frame_help_event, event

Modifies view settings so as to display the either all overlays or those that are active.

grim_menu_view_header_help_event, event

Opens a text window showing the image header.

grim_menu_notes_help_event, event

Opens a text window allowing the user to enter notes for each plane.

grim_menu_image_help_event, event

Toggles the image On/Off.

grim_menu_image_overlays_help_event, event

Toggles the image and overlays On/Off.

grim_menu_context_help_event, event

Toggles the context window On/Off.

grim_menu_axes_help_event, event

Toggles the axes window On/Off.

grim_menu_render_toggle_rgb_help_event, event

Toggles RGB rendering on/off.

grim_menu_render_enter_numbra_help_event, event

This option prompts the user to enter a numbra value for rendering.

grim_menu_render_enter_sampling_help_event, event

This option prompts the user to enter a sampling value for rendering.

grim_menu_render_enter_minimum_help_event, event

This option prompts the user to enter a minimum data value (0-1) for renderings.

grim_menu_render_toggle_current_plane_help_event, event

Toggles rednering from the current plane on/off.

grim_menu_render_toggle_spawn_help_event, event

Toggles spawning of a new plane for each rendering on/off.

grim_menu_render_toggle_sky_help_event, event

Toggles sky rendering on/off.

grim_menu_render_toggle_auto_help_event, event

Toggles automatic rendering on/off.

grim_menu_render_help_event, event

Renders the visible scene and places it in a new plane unless the current plane is already a rendering.

grim_menu_view_colors_help_event, event

Opens gr_colortool.

grim_menu_points_centers_help_event, event

Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes center positions using pg_center for all active globes.

grim_menu_points_limbs_help_event, event

Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes limbs using pg_limbs for all active objects.

grim_menu_points_terminators_help_event, event

Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes terminators using pg_limb with the lights as the observer for all active objects.

grim_menu_points_planet_grids_help_event, event

Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes planet grids using pg_grid for all active objects.

grim_menu_points_rings_help_event, event

Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes ring outlines using pg_disk.

grim_menu_points_ring_grids_help_event, event

Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes ring grids using pg_grid for all active objects.

grim_menu_points_stations_help_event, event

Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes planet stations for all active objects.

grim_menu_points_arrays_help_event, event

Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes arrays for all active objects.

grim_menu_points_stars_help_event, event

Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes star positions using pg_center.

grim_menu_points_shadows_help_event, event

Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes shadows of the currently active overlay points on all other objects. Note that you may have to disable overlay hiding in order to compute and activate all of the appropriate source points for the shadows since many point that are not visible to the observer may still have a line of sight to the lights.

grim_menu_points_reflections_help_event, event

Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes reflections of the currently active overlay points on all other objects. Note that you may have to disable overlay hiding in order to compute and activate all of the appropriate source points for the reflections since many point that are not visible to the observer may still have a line of sight to the lights.

grim_menu_hide_all_help_event, event

Hides/unhides all overlay objects.

grim_menu_clear_all_help_event, event

Clears all objects.

grim_menu_clear_active_help_event, event

Clears all active objects.

grim_menu_activate_all_help_event, event

Activates all objects.

grim_menu_deactivate_all_help_event, event

Deactivates all objects.

grim_menu_invert_all_help_event, event

Inverts current overlay activations.

grim_menu_points_settings_help_event, event

Allows the user modify settings relevant to the overlay points.

Routine details

top grim_menu_file_load_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_file_load_event PURPOSE: Allows user to load images into new image planes. The user is prompted for filenames and DAT_READ is used to read each image. Multiple images may be selected and a new plane is created for each image. On X-windows systems, multiple files may be selected either by dragging across the filenames or by holding down the control key to toggle the selected files. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_file_browse_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_file_browse_event PURPOSE: Allows user to load images into new image planes using the BRIM browser. Images are selected using the left mouse button and each image is loaded on a new plane. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 10/2002

top grim_menu_file_save_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_file_save_event PURPOSE: Allows user to save the current image plane and geometry. If there is no current filename for the current plane, then the user is prompted for one. All descriptors are written through the translators and then DAT_WRITE is used to write the data file. Specific behavior is governed by OMINAS' configuration. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_file_save_as_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_file_save_as_event PURPOSE: Same as 'Save' above, except always prompts for a filename. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_open_as_rgb_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_open_as_rgb_event PURPOSE: Opens a new GRIM window with the current channal configuration reduced to a 3-channel RGB cube. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2016

top grim_menu_file_save_user_ptd_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_file_save_user_ptd_event PURPOSE: Writes user points for the current plane to a file called [image name].user_ptd CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 2/2004

top grim_menu_file_save_all_user_ptd_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_file_save_all_user_ptd_event PURPOSE: Writes user points for all planes to files called [image name].user_ptd CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 2/2004

top grim_menu_file_save_detached_header_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_file_save_detached_header_event PURPOSE: Saves a detached header for the current plane. User is prompted to select the location, and name. Default name is [image name].dh. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 11/2017

top grim_menu_file_save_all_detached_headers_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_file_save_all_detached_headers_event PURPOSE: Writes detached headers for all planes to files called [image name].dh User is prompted for the directory name. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 11/2017

top grim_select_help_event

NV/GR OPERATION: This option toggles a given grim instance between selected and unselected states, for use with functions that require input from more than one grim instance, When a given instance is selected, this button displays an asterisk

NAME: grim_select_event PURPOSE: Selects or unselects a grim window. This functionality is for use with functions that require input from more than one grim instance. The selected state is red; unselected is gray. CATEGORY: NV/GR OPERATION: This option toggles a given grim instance between selected and unselected states, for use with functions that require input from more than one grim instance. When a given instance is selected, this button displays an asterisk. MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_identify_help_event

NV/GR OPERATION: This option causes grim to print a message on the IDL command line, It is useful in cases where multiple grim instances are running in multiple IDL sessions

NAME: grim_identify_event PURPOSE: Causes grim to identify itself on the IDL command line. CATEGORY: NV/GR OPERATION: This option causes grim to print a message on the IDL command line. It is useful in cases where multiple grim instances are running in multiple IDL sessions. MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 3/2009

top grim_menu_file_close_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_file_close_event PURPOSE: Closes the current image plane. All other image plane numbers remain the same. If there is only one image plane, the grim exits. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_plane_next_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_next_event PURPOSE: Changes to the next-numbered image plane. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_plane_previous_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_previous_event PURPOSE: Changes to the previous-numbered image plane. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_plane_jump_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_jump_event PURPOSE: Prompts the user and jumps to a new plane. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 5/2005

top grim_menu_plane_browse_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_browse_event PURPOSE: Opens a brim browser showing all planes. The left mouse button may be used to jump among planes. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 10/2002

top grim_menu_plane_open_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_open_event PURPOSE: Opens the image of the current plane in a new grim window. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 11/2002

top grim_menu_plane_evolve_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_evolve_event PURPOSE: Evolves the selected objects onto all other planes. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 2/2004

top grim_menu_plane_crop_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_crop_event PURPOSE: Crops the data to the current viewing parameters. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 3/2013

top grim_menu_plane_reorder_time_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_reorder_time_event PURPOSE: Rearranges all planes in time order. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 2/2004

top grim_menu_plane_sequence_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_sequence_event PURPOSE: Displays all planes in sequence using xinteranimate. This option is useful or blinking as well. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2002

top grim_menu_plane_dump_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_dump_event PURPOSE: Dumps all planes to png files entitled [filename].png. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2004

top grim_menu_plane_coregister_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_coregister_event PURPOSE: Shifts the images on each plane so as to center the active object at the same pixel on each plane. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 11/2002

top grim_menu_plane_coadd_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_coadd_event PURPOSE: Averages all planes. Not implemented. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 5/2004

top grim_menu_plane_settings_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_plane_settings_event PURPOSE: Allows the user modify settings for the loaded image planes. Each plane may displayed in any combination of the three color channels. Also, a plane may be made visible even when it is not the current plane, instead of the default behavior, which is to display the plane only whenit is current. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2002

top grim_menu_axes_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_axes_event PURPOSE: Toggles the axes window On/Off. The colors are as follows: Blue - Inertial axes. Red - Camera axes. Green - Direction to primary planet, not foreshortened. Yellow - Direction to primary light source, not foreshortened. Vectors pointing away from the camera are dotted. The vectors are rooted at a point 1d5 distance units in front of the camera . In the direction corresponding to the image position of the drawn axes. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 9/2005

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_render_enter_numbra_event PURPOSE: This option prompts the user to enter a numbra value for rendering. Numbra specifies the number of samples to compute on a light source to produce accurate shadows. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2017

top grim_menu_render_toggle_current_plane_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_render_toggle_current_plane_event PURPOSE: Toggles rednering from the current plane on/off. If off, rendering data are taken from any map projections found by PG_LOAD_MAPS. When toggled on, the current data descriptor and camera descriptor are cloned and saved for use as the rendering source. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 8/2017

top grim_menu_points_centers_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_points_centers_event PURPOSE: Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes center positions using pg_center for all active globes. If no active objects, then all centers are computed. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_points_limbs_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_points_limbs_event PURPOSE: Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes limbs using pg_limbs for all active objects. If no active objects, then all limbs are computed. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_points_terminators_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_points_terminators_event PURPOSE: Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes terminators using pg_limb with the lights as the observer for all active objects. If no active objects, then all terminators are computed. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 7/2002

top grim_menu_points_shadows_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_points_shadows_event PURPOSE: Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes shadows of the currently active overlay points on all other objects. Note that you may have to disable overlay hiding in order to compute and activate all of the appropriate source points for the shadows since many point that are not visible to the observer may still have a line of sight to the lights. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 1/2003

top grim_menu_points_reflections_help_event

NV/GR

NAME: grim_menu_points_reflections_event PURPOSE: Obtains the necessary descriptors through the translators and computes reflections of the currently active overlay points on all other objects. Note that you may have to disable overlay hiding in order to compute and activate all of the appropriate source points for the reflections since many point that are not visible to the observer may still have a line of sight to the lights. CATEGORY: NV/GR MODIFICATION HISTORY: Written by: Spitale, 1/2003
